Posts.Content: Dec 3, 2016 04:59PM mommamac wrote: I completed chemo June 22 2016. I lost all my hair every where. Leg hair was the first to come back. It is now 23 weeks since last chemo and i still have no eye brows, or eye lashes. It took a month for my eyes to stop watering. My hair is 1/2 inch in some places but mostly about 1 1/2 inches. It seems like forever. I am not a fan of hats but need to wear to keep my head warm now that winter is upon us. I used to have very thick coarse hair--mostly brown with some grey. Now it is baby fine mostly grey with some brown LOL
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Dec 30, 2015 02:51AM - edited Dec 30, 2015 02:55AM by mommamac Jennie93...I am currently uni due to recent surgery. I wanted both off right away, but my surgeon would only do one at a time. He wanted the cancer part looked after before doing the other breast. I knew I did not want recon. I have several reasons for getting the other off but my Doctor says I can do that at any time with no cost. I am in Canada so maybe it is different here. I am big busted...never really liking my boobs so I am looking forward to teh day I am flat.
